name: ShurikenVR
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

To throw a shuriken: Hold grip to summon shuriken, Hold trigger to lock the aim, swing your hand to shoot.

To teleport: Hold (A) or (X) on Oculus Touch controller (not sure what it'll be on other VR controllers), release to shoot the kunai. You'll be teleport to it after a short delay.
